ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: PROFILE/PROJECTS/ACTIVITIES/ACHIEVEMENTS: Smt. Dhairya Prabhadevi Sojatia Womenâ€™s Welfare Society was set up in the year 2003 with the aim and mission â€œEmpowerment of women through educationâ€. To carry this vision forward SDPS WOMENâ€™S COLLEGE was established, which has become a symbolic logo for excellent higher educational opportunities for women. This institute is suited for every girl/woman, who aspires and dreams and is ready to put in the hard work for professional studies. SDPS focuses on imparting the quality of education that aims at the students overall development and guides them to move towards the future with a completely new approach. The college aims to be the best in the field of education. Some of our activities/projects/achievements are:Leather Research Centre In collaboration with Tata Int. Ltd. SDPS has started a leather research centre to develop new finishes, ornamentation, looks and products for the domestics as well as exports markets. GTZ SDPS Design Development Centre The German Technical collaboration is helping SDPS to give free design and technical service to the Garments manufacturers of Indore, Dewas and Dhar.Saksham â€“ â€œ Training through Established Institutionsâ€ Is a project being run by SDPS to help upgrade skill of Hand Embroidery Artisans, and train them in Fashion Design/Readymade Garments. This project is supported by the Office of the Development Commissioner (Handicrafts) Ministry of Textiles, New Delhi. This scheme comes under â€œTraining Through Established Institutionsâ€ and we christened it â€œSakshamâ€ - means self reliance. Shahari Sworajgar Yojana:Under Shahari Sworajgar Yojana by Urban Development Authority of Indore, SDPS is undertaking courses for students from BPL families for Computer and stitching/tailoring. Cone Craft Work Shop:The SDPS Womenâ€™s college also is undertaking the project of design development in â€œCone Craft Workshopâ€ under the patronage of Madhya Pradesh Handicrafts and Handloom Development Corporation. This is a short term project and 20 artisans are being benefited and 75 design prototypes are being developed. Leather Craft Work Shop:The SDPS Womenâ€™s college also is undertaking the project of design development in â€œLeather Craftâ€ under integrated cluster development programme under the auspices of Madhya Pradesh Handicrafts and Handloom Development Corporation. This is also a short term project and 50 artisans are being benefited and 100 design prototypes are being developed. OUR MISSION "Empowering Women Through Education" EDUCATION IS NOT A BUSINESS FOR SDPS. IT SERVES AS A MEANS TO THE END. SDPS EXISTS FORâ€¦â€¦ THE EMPOWERMENT OF WOMEN!

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Sewabharti Jabalpur is working on different project. Ist project is Matrachhaya- in this project sewabharti is tirelessly working and looking after the toddlers which are abandoned due to various factors. IInd project is Gurukul & Ladli Basera- in this project Sewabharti Jabalpur caters for the children boys and girls between 6-18 yrs of age. We pick up children from lowest strata of society, abandoned due to various reasons including children of convicted and jailed parents. We give shelter, food, uniform, copy, books and education.IIIrd APARAJEETA- In this project Sewabharti Jabalpur impart training to deprived ladies for sewing, knitting, painting and other professional arts. After training we equip them with necessary machines and infrastructure and provide them work and their door step to make their life sustainable.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Shadow group is trying to establish the kind of art, which is unique in itself. SHADOW group is established in 2001. Since last ten years shadow is working in techniques of mime in M.P. The main motto of our group is to bring back the gradually waning art in its originality not only in M.P but also in other parts of India. SHADOW is also engaged in helping the mentally retarded, deaf and dump children. For them we arrange workshops. With this view we are presenting mime in a very new form. We present the mime based on the stories of writers like Chiomihara sadat Hasan Manto Directed Mime plays Directed a Mime Play Parchaiyna based on various situation 2003 Directed a Mime play Aiana based on Japanese writer Chiomihara 2004 Directed a Mime play Jebkatra based on Sadat Hasan Manto 2005 Directed a Mime play Third Flag based on corruption 2006 Directed a Mime play Nithari based on child frustration 2007 Directed a Mime play Rama based on Ramayana2007 Directed a Mime play Buddha In Showcase2008 Directed a Mime play Save Human 2009 Directed a Mime play Old Age Home 2009 Directed a collage of poems in Mime form Tana Bana for Vivechana repertory in Jabalpur2003 Mukti ka Maha Yagya for Madhukali Bhopal 2004 Kavita yatra for Sutradhar Bhopal 2005 Hori Ho Brij Raj for Sutradhar Bhopal 2008 Mime Workshops N.T.P.C Anta,Rajasthan organized by SPIC MACAY Various schools of Kota Rajasthan organized by SPIC MACAY Jodhapur, Rajasthan by SPIC MACAY Alwar, Rahasthan by SPIC MACAY Savay Mansingh School Jaipur. We have provided education to poor children of ruralareas and specially child labor. We have operated crÃ¨che forkids of working women. we have operated and managed helpline tocooperate assist and help the women, victimized of any type ofviolence ( sex determination, female feticide, sexual harassment,dowry killing, child marriage, child trafficking, rape and domesticviolence) violating human rights through counseling or , if necessarylegal redress. To sum up our goal isa healthy prosperous peaceful gender sensitive society where peoplein general and socially and financially deprived women, children andyouth in particular have their right to a life of dignity. The Samitiaims to pull the social barriers of class, cast and gender in MP bythe end of 2020.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The shreyas samaj seva sanstha (SSSS) was established in the month of Dec, 1995, as a voluntary , non-profit, non governmental with headquarters at Indore for the noble cause of population control empowerment of women and to raise the status of women. To improve the quality of life and over all development of the population stabilization is an essential requirement for promoting sustainable development. It is based upon the issues of child survival, maternal health. The sanstha (SSSS) is dedicated to enhancing the quality of care through appropriate management of available resource. The Sanstha is deeply committed to all aspects of Planned Parenthood by inherent orientation special emphasis is paid to involve women, both as agents of change and facilitators in the progressive improvement of their quality of life and that of their community. The SSSS is providing area specific and need based qualitative family welfare service including reproductive and sexual health to the client of rural slum, urban slums in collaboration with others organization working in our operational areas SSSS is a leading organization in the field of RCH & family welfare counselling women development empowerment, environmental, plantation, and training orientation of professional of volunteers opinion leaders and NGO staff.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: FOR THE LAST SEVEN YEARS THE ORGANIZATION INVOLVED IN THE URBAN AND RURAL DEVELOPMENT ACTIVITIES.WHILE WORKING WITH THE PEOPLE FOR THEIR DEVELOPMENT, WE GAINED THE KNOWLEDGE AND EXPERIENCE OF THE COMMUNITY. DEVELOPMENT ORGANIZATION IS IMPLEMENTING DIFFERENT AWARENESS PROGRAMS INCLUDING CANCER FOR LAST SEVEN YEARS.ALSO WORKS FOR SOCIAL,EDUCATIONAL ,HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENT ISSUES .

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Shri Akhand Jyoti Samiti, is a non-profitable registered NGO under M.P. society registration act, 1973 on date 13/12/2012 at College Road, Civil Line, Betul. Its operational area consists of the urban and rural areas of the Betul District. The objectives of the organization are to improve the living conditions of the society of the urban and rural villages through various awareness including Cancer, educational and cultural activities. Besides this we promote Tribal Language (Gondi).

For actual development of any community, organization believed to plan the activities according to the needs of the community with the active participation and involvement of the peoples of that community.

Organization has a long experience working with the peoples especially the unorganized and marginalized. Organization is implementing different awareness programs for last 7 years. Organization made use of the govt. schemes for the various income generating activities. Organization also works for social issues, educational issues, health issues and developmental issues of the rural peoples. A lot of changes are taking place in the life of people both external and internal.

FUTURE PLAN Conducting different activities for the development of tribal area.Try to establish a community radio at Distt. Head Quarter for promoting the cultural, social, development and other activities run by the Different communities, which is not promoted by any media/source. Organising Women awareness program to make them aware with their laws and rights formed under constitution. Women came to know about the rights which are meant for their safety.

But in a country of over 1.2 billion people, we need solutions that scale. With an office in Ujjain connects young social innovators with mentors, technology and capital.
